import React, { useState } from "react"; import RestaurantFinder from "../apis/RestaurantFinder"; import { useLocation, useParams, Navigate } from "react-router-dom"; const AddReview = () => { const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [reviewText, setReviewText] = useState(""); const [rating, setRating] = useState("Rating"); return (
setName(e.target.value)} id="name" placeholder="name" type="text" className="form-control" />
) } export default AddReview
